'''Petrichor''' is a town in [[Fontaine]] that is the hometown of the researcher and filmmaker [[Xavier]]. Petrichor is the site of a majestic waterfall, which is visible from Xavier's study. The town is known for its beauty<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Tatara Tales (Quest)}}</ref> and its exceedingly pure waters.<ref>{{Ref/Item|Dew of Repudiation}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* The term "{{w|petrichor}}" (from Ancient Greek {{Lang|mini=1|grc=πέτρᾱ|grc_rm=pétrā|grc_tl=rock}} and {{Lang|mini=1|grc=ῑ̓χώρ|grc_rm=īkhṓr|grc_tl={{w|ichor}}}}) was coined by two Australian researchers in 1964. It refers to the pleasant, earthy smell when rain falls on dry soil.
